p: 6-amino-2-chloroquinoline-3-carbaldehyde (0.02 mol) was refluxed with 5 mL (excess) of NH 2 -NH 2 in ethanol for 5–6h. Their action mixture was then cooled and poured into ice-cold water. The solid that formed was filtered, washed with water, and dried. It was crystallized with ethyl acetate. m.p. 288 °C.Yield: 76%. Color: yellowish-brown.
